1.title: Colossal Tales
1.plot: A new student spells competitive trouble for Carlos and Sluggy and catapults our hero into a tangled web of deception and lies.

2.title: Topsy Turvy
2.plot: The town's residents slack off their responsibilities to pursue music careers, professional leapfrogging and martial arts, leaving Carlos alone to face a near disaster.

3.title: No Prize Surprise
3.plot: Carlos has a gleam in his eye for a cool gadget just like Sluggy's. A blunder of the mouth boomerangs back to Carlos, bringing him to his senses as to the real treasures he possesses.

4.title: Litterbug
4.plot: While the rest of their schoolmates participate in cleaning their school grounds, Carlos and Antonio give everyone the slip and head out for a day of fun in the sun at the local beach.

5.title: Buggy Bigbucks
5.plot: When Carlos finds a lottery ticket and wins what he thinks is a large fortune, his life suddenly takes a new twist!

6.title: Ultrabug
6.plot: The peaceful town of Mogan is disrupted by the sudden appearance of a costumed duo of super-heroes.

7.title: Bug-a-Boo
7.plot: A school camping trip takes a twist as a dare to watch a series of "scary movies" sets the imagination of the student bugs awhirl.

8.title: Batter Chatter
8.plot: During a pie competition, Carlos jumps to a far-fetched conclusion which spreads like wildfire

9.title: Buggy Breakup
9.plot: When the bug students work together on a school float to collect food for a charity event, they lose sight of the goal and begin to compete against each other.

10.title: Cheater Critters
10.plot: When Carlos decides to cheat his way to good grades, his deceit is exposed and he learns that dishonesty doesn't pay.

11.title: Royal Trouble
11.plot: When Carlos and Sluggy compete for a role in the school play, they learn a lesson in humility.

12.title: Hocus Bogus
12.plot: Carlos and Sluggy try rather dubious means to earn money to attend the state fair and learn a lesson in diligence and hard work.

imdb.plot outline: The Adventures of Carlos Caterpillar tells the growing up story of Carlos, an ever-curious little caterpillar who often finds himself in one predicament or another. Helped by his Uncle Pedro, a butterfly with a lifetime of experience behind him, Carlos learns many lessons that will help him through his own little journey of life! These entertaining adventures are done in full 3D animation with great music and Latin flavor. Seven episodes: #1, Colossal Tales (Being Yourself) -- A new student in town spells competitive trouble for Carlos and Sluggy and catapults our hero into a tangled web of deception and lies. #2, Topsy Turvy (Responsibility) -- When all of the town's residents mysteriously slack off their responsibilities to pursue rap careers, professional leapfrogging and marital arts, Carlos alone is left to face a near disaster. #3, No Prize Surprise (Appreciation for what we have) -- Carlos has a gleam in his eye for a cool gadget just like Sluggy's, but a blunder of the mouth brings Carlos to his senses as to the real treasures he possesses. #4, Litterbug (Care of the Environment) -- While the rest of their schoolmates participate in cleaning their school grounds, Carlos and Antonio give everyone the slip and head out for a day of fun. #5, Buggy Bug Bucks (True Value of Friendship) -- When Carlos finds a lottery ticket and wins what he thinks is a large fortune, his life suddenly takes a new twist! #6, Ultrabug (True Heroism) -- The peaceful town of Mogan is disrupted by the sudden appearance of a costumed duo of super-heroes. #7, Bug-A-Boo (Safe Viewing) -- A school camping trip takes a twist as a dare to watch a series of "scary movies" sets the imagination of the student bugs awhirl. #8, Batter Chatter (The Dangers of Gossip) -- During a pie competition, Carlos jumps to a far-fetched conclusion which spreads like wildfire. #9, Buggy Breakup (The Importance of Teamwork) --When the bug students work together on a school f
